sense.gloss: leak (of secrets, information, etc.), disclosure, divulging
leak (of gas, liquid, etc.), leakage, escape (of gas), coming through (of light)

sdata.j: ↑公務員↑↓こうむいん↓が↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を↑漏↑↓も↓らして、↑秘密|↑↓ひみつ↓↑漏洩|↑↓ろうえい↓↑罪↑↓ざい↓として↑罰↑↓ばっ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The public servant leaked the secret and he was prosecuted for revealing a state secret.
